India - Wheat Storage Project :

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project will consist of (a)
            the planning, design, construction and equipping of 10 silos
            of 20,000 tons capacity each, and of 10 godowns of 10,000
            tons capacity each located in northwest India, (b) the
            training of silo personnel and, (c) and all-India study of
            foodgrain storage and distribution. The project will provide
            300,000 tons of additional storage capacity to help reduce
            the current public storage deficit of 900,000 tons and will
            also add about 6 percent to gross public storage facilities.
